_sText:
Goto the console and set phys_pushscale to .1 to make the cars less bumpy


just a little map i was messing around with
handling is pretty good, they do like to flip over and kill you on bumps
to drive a car shoot or use the cat picture button
if your car flips over stand back and shoot the blue button
touching the skull means instant death
the map itself was going to be a skybox so it might look strange
theres hostages and no rescue zone (they are for running over)
i'd make it hdr but then it means a 25 meg file

feel free to use the cars in another map
